column2: "Charlotte! Such an effusion of love is unnecessary! I have heard you loud and clear!"
"So please calm-..."
"Adadadada... Charlotte, I will find a way to raise your spirits. Your feelings have more than reached me!"
"So you must get along with everyone... You are all my beloved childre-..."
"Salutations, my friend! What great fortune to have met here..."
"Charlotte, please calm yourself! They are a friend! There is no danger..."
"An introduction is in order. This is Charlotte, the Redran."
"She's very overprotective of me. You see how aggressive she is?"
"Because of that, she often quarrels with my other children. They do not get along well, but it is due to her great love for me, you see?"
"Such passionate sentiments are too much for my heart!"
"Charlotte, what's wrong? You mustn't glare like that..."
"Wh-what has gotten into you! Why did you suddenly attack them!"
"Hahaha, I see now! You are jealous of the camaraderie we share!"
"I am very sorry for that, my friend. But what a spectacular show on your part!"
"Now, Charlotte. Let us return..."
"Ch-Charlotte...? Why do you continue to scowl at them...?"
"You're pretty strong."
"Keep working hard."
"Yes, I see. Charlotte wishes to grow stronger for my sake."
"Do not fret, Charlotte. I love you even as you are now, and will rely on your..."
"Hahaha... As fervent as ever!"
"Very well, Charlotte. Unleash all of your feelings! I will receive them with my full power!"
"Adadadada... Ghah!"
